title: AI Chatbots Are Invading Your Local Government—and Making Everyone Nervous
description: State and local governments in the US are scrambling to harness tools like ChatGPT to unburden their bureaucracies, rushing to write their own rules—and avoid generative AI's many pitfalls.

title: Sundar Pichai on Google’s AI, Microsoft’s AI, OpenAI, and … Did We Mention AI?
description: The tech giant is 25 years old. In a chatbot war. On trial for antitrust. But its CEO says Google is good for 25 more.

title: These Prisoners Are Training AI
description: In high-wage Finland, where clickworkers are rare, one company has discovered a novel labor force—prisoners.

title: Facebook Is Giving Up on News—Again
description: Meta says it will retire Facebook's "news" tag in the UK, France, and Germany, ahead of rules that might force it to pay for content. Users may not care, but it has left media scrambling.

title: TikTok Is Spending $1.3 Billion to Dodge Bans in Europe
description: European politicians are nervous about where TikTok’s data goes. The company is spending big on local data centers, but analysts say it’s not enough.
